original: intros b Hb a. destruct (Zdiv_eucl_exist (Z.of_nat b) ltac:(apply (Zgt_pos_0 _ Hb))) as [qr Hqr]. exists (fst qr, Z.to_nat (snd qr)). split. - rewrite <- (Z2Nat.id (snd qr)). + apply Hqr. apply Zle_0_nat. + apply (proj2 Hqr). - rewrite Z2Nat.id. + rewrite (proj2 Hqr). reflexivity. + apply (proj2 Hqr).
